## Deliverables

- [ ] LaTeX source file(s) in `thesis/chapters/`
- [ ] Diagrams (if applicable)
- [ ] Bibliography entries (if new references are introduced)
- [ ] Cross-references to other chapters
- [ ] Integration with `main.tex`

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] LaTeX compiles without errors
- [ ] Content is substantive (no placeholders)
- [ ] Cross-references resolve correctly
- [ ] Bibliography citations are complete
- [ ] Writing is clear and technically accurate
- [ ] Peer review completed (if applicable)
